data.what_is: EVINENT ANALYTICS ANTIFRAUD Our intelligent fraud prevention platform can detect and prevent fraudulent and anomalous activity within your business. Flexible system built using machine learning algorithms to highlight fraud operations and anomalies can providee in-depth results to protect your business from exploitation. With our platform, there is no need to spend money on dozens of cybersecurity workers or stress over useless statistics.
data.product_description: EVINENT ANALYTICS ANTIFRAUD Our intelligent fraud prevention platform can detect and prevent fraudulent and anomalous activity within your business. Flexible system built using machine learning algorithms to highlight fraud operations and anomalies can providee in-depth results to protect your business from exploitation. With our platform, there is no need to spend money on dozens of cybersecurity workers or stress over useless statistics.

initial_reviews.review_title: Evinent Analytics - Robust Data analytics tool
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Evinent Analytics?
The analytic services provided via this platform are really good, helping our customers excel in their analytics requirements, our team got real help with the tools and features provided from this great platform.

What do you dislike about Evinent Analytics?
Well there's no dislikes as of yet, tool works as per business requirements giving good insights into day to days works, customers are happy and we are good as well with overall performance.

What problems is Evinent Analytics solving and how is that benefiting you?
Helping customers withrefreshed look of data with excellent visuals ,indepth details on their day to day data, customer are able to navigate quite easily across presented metrics giving chance to increase overall productivity.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Evinent Analytics?
All the features are in one place. Everything related to data and analytics can be used to generate different kinds of reports such as sales reports, customer patterns and many more. It also helps in Fraud and Risk analytics. It also integrates CRM, ERP, and Accounting systems all in one place.

What do you dislike about Evinent Analytics?
The pricing is one of the first things that comes to my mind.

What problems is Evinent Analytics solving and how is that benefiting you?
They help with almost every aspect of an organization and can help all types of industries in generating multiple reports related to sales or almost anything that you wish for.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Evinent Analytics?

Everything related to data and analytics can be used to generate different kinds of reports such as sales reports, customer patterns and many more. It also helps in Fraud and Risk analytics. It also integrates CRM, ERP, and Accounting systems all in one place.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Evinent Analytics?
The predictive analysis provided to understand my customer

What do you dislike about Evinent Analytics?
Price is too high and lack of integrations

Recommendations to others considering Evinent Analytics:
I recommend the platform

What problems is Evinent Analytics solving and how is that benefiting you?
Create insight easily regarding customers behavior
